title: Build a Landing Page for 'Cairo Coffee House'
description: We need a modern, single-page website for our new branch in Maadi. It must show our menu, location on Google Maps, and a 'Contact Us' form. Design must be responsive for mobile phones.

title: Fix Python Script for Data Analysis
description: I have a Python script for my graduation project that scrapes data from a news site, but it keeps crashing with a 'KeyError'. I need someone to debug it and make it save the data to a CSV file correctly.

title: Logo Design for 'Al-Amal Pharmacy'
description: We are opening a new pharmacy in Nasr City. We need a professional logo that uses Green and White colors. Please provide 3 variations.

title: Inventory System for Mobile Shop
description: I own a small mobile shop and need a simple desktop app to track my phones and accessories. I want to add items, see stock count, and record sales. Needs to be in Arabic if possible.

title: Convert Figma Design to HTML/CSS
description: We have a completed design in Figma for our 'About Us' page. We need a frontend developer to convert it into pixel-perfect HTML/CSS code.

title: Help with Machine Learning Model (Regression)
description: I am stuck on a task to predict housing prices in Cairo using a dataset. My model has very low accuracy. I need an ML engineer to review my Jupyter Notebook and improve the model.
